toolDescription: Generate accessible alt text descriptions for images using AI.

audienceLevels.label: Undergraduate Year 1
audienceLevels.promptModifier: The audience is first-year undergraduate students who may be new to this subject.

audienceLevels.label: Undergraduate Year 2
audienceLevels.promptModifier: The audience is second-year undergraduate students with foundational knowledge.

audienceLevels.label: Undergraduate Year 3
audienceLevels.promptModifier: The audience is third-year undergraduate students with intermediate knowledge.

audienceLevels.label: Undergraduate Year 4
audienceLevels.promptModifier: The audience is final-year undergraduate students with advanced knowledge.

audienceLevels.label: Postgraduate
audienceLevels.promptModifier: The audience is postgraduate students with specialist knowledge in the field.

audienceLevels.label: Staff / Academic
audienceLevels.promptModifier: The audience is academic staff and researchers with expert knowledge.

descriptionStyles.label: Brief
descriptionStyles.promptModifier: For the Long Description section: provide a BRIEF summary of two to three sentences total (maximum 60 words). Within Visual Content: describe only the most essential visual elements in one sentence. Within Educational Significance: state the primary learning purpose in one sentence. Omit fine architectural details, decorative elements, and extended thematic analysis. Prioritise immediate clarity and conciseness.

descriptionStyles.label: Detailed
descriptionStyles.promptModifier: For the Long Description section: provide COMPREHENSIVE coverage using clear structure. Within Visual Content: systematically describe overall layout, key components and relationships, colours and patterns (considering accessibility for colour-blind users), and any text or labels. Within Educational Significance: explain connections to stated learning objectives, key concepts illustrated, and how this particular visualisation aids understanding. Use clear paragraph breaks and maintain logical organisation throughout.

descriptionStyles.label: Technical
descriptionStyles.promptModifier: For the Long Description section: use appropriate academic and discipline-specific terminology throughout. Assume intermediate-to-advanced knowledge in the stated subject area. In Visual Content: employ precise technical terms relevant to the discipline (such as anatomical terminology for biology, chemical notation for chemistry, or architectural vocabulary for built environment studies). In Educational Significance: use analytical language and reference relevant theoretical frameworks or methodologies. Balance technical precision with the accessibility principles outlined in the writing guide.

checkboxOptions.label: Include colour descriptions
checkboxOptions.promptModifier: Include descriptions of colours where they convey meaning or aid understanding.

checkboxOptions.label: Include spatial relationships
checkboxOptions.promptModifier: Describe spatial relationships between elements (e.g., 'to the left of', 'above', 'surrounding').

checkboxOptions.label: Transcribe any visible text
checkboxOptions.promptModifier: Transcribe any visible text in the image accurately.

checkboxOptions.label: Include emotional tone
checkboxOptions.promptModifier: Describe the emotional tone or mood conveyed by the image where relevant.

checkboxOptions.label: Focus on data/numbers
checkboxOptions.promptModifier: Pay particular attention to any data, statistics, or numerical information visible in the image.
